name: dash-grid-layout
description: Dash UI Component for using the React Grid Layout library

scripts.build-dev: builder run clean-lib && builder run extract-metadata && webpack -w --config=config/webpack/webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.build: builder run clean-lib && builder run extract-metadata && webpack --config=config/webpack/webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.build-dist: builder run clean-lib && builder run extract-metadata && webpack --config=config/webpack/webpack.config.dist.js
scripts.install-local: npm run copy-lib && python setup.py install
scripts.prepublish: npm test && builder run build-dist && npm run copy-lib
scripts.publish-all: npm publish && python setup.py sdist upload
scripts.publish-pypi: npm run prepublish && python setup.py sdist upload
